attributes.action: create a policy for the rights of future parents undergoing fertility treatment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present within the workplace, women undergoing fertility treatment are not entitled to paid time off for hospital appointments because they are not yet pregnant.

It is distressing enough to worry about the prospect of being unable to have a family as well as undergoing drug therapy or surgery, without the worry of losing your job through absence.

Fertility treatment, as well as miscarriage or ectopic pregnancy before 24 weeks should be regarded as pregnancy related.

After all, most causes of infertility or pregnancy loss are due to medical conditions and should be treated as such.
